title: Halo Infinite's Infinite Disappointment - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.01.22
description:
The Xcast invades Kinda Funny Games Daily to talk about Halo Infinite's lackluster update!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:32 - Housekeeping

A New PS I Love You XOXO is up and it’s all about pitting The Last of Us Part 1 and Part 2 against each other! Which one is better? Find out on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe!

The Roper Report  -

00:05:12 - Phil Spencer Confirms Call of Duty on PS5, Game Pass
00:20:52 - Halo Dates Forge, Dumps Split-Screen Co-op
00:43:59 - Ad
00:46:10 - Assassin’s Creed Mirage SUPER Confirmed by Ubi
00:51:09 - Zelda Blowout in September?
00:57:24 - Top Games on Steam Deck
00:59:00 - Out today
01:02:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Bless
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
